details.text: The concept '35200-5' has a status of DISCOURAGED and its use should be reviewed

The pattern [system http://loinc.org, code 35217-9, and display 'Triglyceride [Moles/​volume] in Serum or Plasma'] defined in the profile http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/triglyceride|5.0.0 not found.
